abstract: Asustek, which pioneered the netbook, is dreaming big, hoping to offer everything from smartphones to game consoles.
snippet: Asustek, which pioneered the netbook, is dreaming big, hoping to offer everything from smartphones to game consoles.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:44 p.m.  Clarifying to reflect that Asustek now says that the company has no plans for a game console and that Jonathan Tsang was only describing the features of a game controller that would be used with a PC. Also clarifying language about Asus’s brand recognition in the United States.
